name: ext_R2_Conformance_me_event
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Conformance.messaging.event for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Conformance.messaging.event from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Conformance|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.
